channel.title: Emacs on Rick Wysocki
channel.description: Recent content in Emacs on Rick Wysocki

item.title: Link Roundup: January 27, 2025
item.description: Phew! This semester is kicking my ass. Somehow I’ve started on the back foot and have been busy since day one. That said, I’ve got two interesting articles here touching on how we hide unethical behavior as “apps” and the seeming need to dependencize everything. (I made up the word dependencize; don’t blame the author.) See the articles and some of my own thoughts below. Cory Doctorow, “It’s Not a Crime if We Do it With an App” Link to Article
